transArray.content: The service is great and the hygiene is very clean. I am very satisfied. I will definitely stay here again in the future. It is a newly opened store. The rooms are all smart and the quality of the slippers is also very good.
A brief reunion, a hasty parting, but what is left is the beauty that is missed in the heart! Your praise is the source of our motivation! We sincerely invite you to visit us again!
